duties_responsibilities.duty: Edit projects from start to finish that engage an audience, ranging from 15-second edits to 30+ min.
Stay abreast of trends and technology to aid in project deliverables and push boundaries.
Manage and safeguard all media, including performing daily digital image transfers.
Facilitate and address all agency and/or client cut changes throughout the approval process.
Concept and edit trailers, teasers, and company marketing material.
Maintain proper file structure allowing for future edits/adaptations and observe best practices for data storage.
Oversee short and long-term data storage and observe related best practices.
Maintain all editing equipment, troubleshoot problems, and actively facilitate repairs.
Ensure the brand aesthetic is successfully translated into high-quality visual assets.
Always be pushing the envelope to further separate us from other production houses.
Relocation to Louisville, KY required. Excited to travel and can be on production for extended periods of time if required.
Proficient using non-linear editing software and After Effects.
Highly creative and an out-of-the-box thinker that has worked in both the documentary and commercial spheres.
A team player that thrives in a collaborative environment and maintains a positive attitude in stressful situations.
Practices humility and is hungry to learn. Mad ping-pong skills.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Film, Media, or related field (Master's preferred)
